title: Reading with Randos: Spirits in Bondage (Part 1)
description:
Shari and Jeff try their hand at interpreting poetry together and making guesses about the intentions of a young C.S. Lewis as they work through his first published work, a book of poems, entitled "Spirits in Bondage: A Cycle of Lyrics"

Spirits in Bondage: A Cycle of Lyrics eBook:
https://www.gutenberg.org/files/2003/2003-h/2003-h.htm#link2H_4_0002

The Meaning Code - Karen and Michael's discussion on data compression:
https://youtu.be/gbmm3l9HP4Q

Join the ConverZation here:
https://discord.gg/j8ps92H

Check out Paul Vanderklay's channel here:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGsD...
